admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
Perusahaan Umum Telekomunikasi
            (PERUMTEL) has a large investment program and is
            experiencing difficulties in implementing the program.  The
            Telecommunications Technical Assistance Project is therefore
            designed to improve the capacity of PERUMTEL to implement
            this and future programs.  It will provide for program
            management consultants to assist PERUMTEL, over three years,
            in planning and implementing the outside plant (cable
            network) expansion program, currently its main bottleneck,
            and in coordinating this with the rest of PERUMTEL's
            investments.  The project will also support other
            institutional strengthening efforts of PERUMTEL, in
            particular improving its financial management, developing
            its capability to review tariffs and upgrading its training program.
